function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Socioeconomic conditions exacerbating consequences of the pandemic","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Loneliness due to social distancing measures","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inefficient removal of formaldehyde and toluene from the air","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Compact housing design leading to lower satisfaction with floor area","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Cost effectiveness of 5g technology","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate monitoring of employees’ health","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on human mobility for the spatial spread of the virus may lead to uncontrolled propagation in densely populated areas with high mobility.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of natural outdoor environment","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainty in measuring success of regenerative development projects","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of green space leading to increased lifestyle diseases like type-ii diabetes and heart diseases","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Stronger associations between greenspace exposure and health outcomes for low socioeconomic status groups","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Environmental noise pollution impacting health and well-being","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of immediate threat perception","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Policy variables at a more granular level than infection data","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Delay in
